pr_title: Resolves #1000: Some filters can be performed with covering index …

timeline.bodyText: A text index, in particular, does not have the actual indexed text in the entry.
timeline.author: MMcM

replies.bodyText: This is a great point. I think it's worth adding it as a comment here in case someone forgets this in the future.
replies.author: nschiefer

timeline.bodyText: I think that this part here only works because findFilterCoveredFields() ignored nested repeated fields entirely. That's fine with me, but I think it needs a comment to that effect or someone might mess this up later.
timeline.author: nschiefer

replies.bodyText: I put the comment on findFilterCoveredFields; I think I captured the essence of the tricky cases.
replies.author: MMcM

timeline.message: Allow FunctionKeyExpression Builder to be in any package

Resolves #1000: Some filters can be performed with covering index scan's partial record.
Attempt to match the key expressions corresponding to the filter component to the index entry.
Some comments about delicate aspects of these transformations
